title: Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s seal: Seeing the seal in a dream is a sign that carries many interpretations and meanings. To see the seal on a paper is a sign of assuming a position, authority, or a position of prestige. On the contrary, when you see the seal removed from the paper, it is a sign of losing positions and authority, and God knows best. Dreaming of mustard in a dream of Imam Al-SadiqMurdard in a dream indicates a lot of hard work and effort to earn money and survive, or if the dreamer feels uncomfortable from seeing mustard, this indicates distress or fatigue and an effort that cannot be replaced, and God knows best.Interpretation of a dream about a sheep by Imam Al-SadiqThe sheep in The dream indicates the birth of a male from a female. It is also evidence of the righteousness of the children, their righteousness to their parents, the integrity of their future, and many good things that God obtains, and God knows best. Slippers in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Slippers are symbols that indicate the acquisition of money or an upcoming trip, and they are also an indication of Collapse of worries and anxiety when wearing slippers in a dream. Vinegar in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Vinegar is one of the interpretations that heralds goodness and justice in the circumstances of the fortuneteller, and vinegar symbolizes the blessing of health and money, as it is a sign of longevity. It may happen soon between the person having the vision and his family, and God knows best. Mandala in a dream about Imam Al-SadiqAnklets are among the praiseworthy symbols in a woman’s dream, as they indicate marriage in an unmarried girl’s dream. Also, seeing aprons in a married woman’s dream means happy news, and on the contrary, seeing Bicycle in a dream. A human dream is a sign of anxiety, corruption and sadness that pervade the life of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the letter Kha by NabulsiDreams with the letter KhaA pig in a dream according to Imam al-SadiqA pig in a dream is one of the unwanted symbols that symbolize an unjust enemy and his great evil, and seeing a pig riding in a dream means a lot of money. Eating pork in a dream means forbidden money, and God knows best. A dream about peaches by Imam Al-Sadiq: Peaches are one of the fruits that herald goodness and justice in the life of the dreamer. Perhaps it is to remove worries and problems and overcome challenges, especially when he sees a sweet-tasting peach. As for sour peaches, it portends fear and panic that will afflict the fortuneteller, and God knows best. Cucumber in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Cucumber is considered one of the vegetables whose vision in a dream is considered an undesirable symbol, and portends many worries, challenges, and problems. Also, seeing eating cucumber in a dream indicates many challenges. Which the viewer is exposed to and seeing cutting cucumbers in a dream is good news and recovery from diseases, and God knows best. Horses in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Horses in a dream are symbols that herald a lot of sustenance, and indicate an upcoming journey and the ability to overcome obstacles and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. Meanings of the letter Kha for the Imam. The honest baker in a dream is one of the symbols that convey safety, security, family stability, prosperity, and the removal of worries and anxiety. Dreaming of a cheek is a sign of suffering and distress.

title: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the demolition of buildings that appear in front of a married woman symbolizes control over her intense fear of some things in her life. Seeing buildings being demolished suggests a sense of disappointment, failure, sadness, and anxiety that dominates her. Or the demolition of buildings may be due to control. Many negative thoughts at this time. It is also said that seeing the demolition of buildings in a married woman’s dream is mainly due to the large amount of debt and financial problems that this woman suffers from. Perhaps the demolition of buildings is a symbol of the lack of success in raising children and this woman’s suffering from children’s disobedience. If the woman sees The married woman herself is demolishing her house, so this vision is a warning to her, because she may take wrong actions that may expose her to the destruction of her house. Or seeing buildings being demolished may be a sign of her lack of security in her married life. Read also: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream. Seeing the demolition of houses in a dream indicates the demolition of houses that It is often seen by married women indicating that they have gone through many obstacles, difficulties and challenges. If a married woman sees in a dream that the house of her acquaintances is being demolished, these people may be exposed to a major disaster in the coming days. Perhaps the demolition of many houses is in front of her, because she has seen many cases of divorce of her acquaintances In the past. Or the demolition of houses before the eyes of a married woman may be a sign of her failure in her current job and her incurring many losses. Also, seeing houses being demolished symbolizes successive health problems that this woman will be exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about the collapse of a tall building for a married woman: The collapse of a building often indicates A towering sign indicates that this woman has suffered from great injustice and tyranny in her life. Or seeing a large building collapsing in front of her may symbolize that she will suffer a great financial loss in the coming period. If the large building that is located in front of her is the building in which she lives, then she may divorce her husband after years of marriage. Marriage. Or the collapse of a tall building in a dream may be a warning sign for him, because he is deficient in worship and obedience, and he must pay attention. Seeing the collapse of a large building in a dream means that this woman has lost one of her friends or acquaintances who have lived in her life for years. Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream for a woman PregnantIt is said that a married woman’s dream of demolishing buildings in the first months indicates that this pregnancy is incomplete and may fall. Or seeing the demolition of buildings for a pregnant woman may indicate that she is suffering from some health problems during the current pregnancy. Perhaps seeing the demolition of buildings in a pregnant woman is a sign of During this period, she was overwhelmed with anxiety. Or the buildings she saw in her dream might be demolished because she did not feel comfortable and stable in her married life. Also, seeing buildings being demolished symbolizes the birth of a child who suffers from some health problems or suffers from a certain disease. Surviving the demolition in... A dream about a married woman surviving after the demolition shows that she has escaped from a major conspiracy that some people in her life planned for her. Or the vision of surviving the demolition may symbolize getting out of many debts.

title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair

preview.html: Today we look at the interpretation of the dream of long hair when we see it in a dream and its impact and importance in one's life. Interpretation of the dream of long hair One of the dreams that a person sees in his sleep is seeing hair or styling it or anything related to long hair, and each of these dreams has many options in reading and interpreting it, and commentators have excelled in this matter as follows. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of long hair in a dream as good news, sustenance and money. This money and sustenance will go a long way in the life of the sleeper or dreamer. It was also interpreted as a wonderful sign of longevity and good health that accompanied this god in his life. Some have interpreted it as a means of healing from a disease that may have its roots in the body of the sleeper. And that this recovery is faster than usual. Al-Nabulsi added to the interpretation of long hair in a dream to indicate that. The good news that that person will hear. And success in practical life and the great living that comes from trade. And obtaining high grades for the student, especially the girl in her field of study. See also: Interpretation of a dream of long hair for a pregnant woman Interpretation of dreams Long hair in a single dream Long hair in a dream of an unmarried girl It symbolizes many things, including: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream with long hair means the happiness that fills her life. It also indicates a meeting and a close encounter with her lover or future husband. It also indicates long hair if an unmarried woman sees it in her dream. Comfort and happiness that fills her life and peace due to her good behavior and high morals. Seeing a girl with long, well-groomed hair and a good appearance indicates that she will be engaged, or that her wedding date is approaching if she is engaged. Seeing long, black, smooth hair is a sign for unmarried people, signs of God’s satisfaction with her. And the livelihood that will come to her in life, whether it is marriage, money or position. Interpretation of dreams Long hair in a married woman’s dream The interpretation of seeing a dream with long hair in a dream, and what a married woman sees, is as follows: The interpretation of this dream is that a married woman sees it with her husband’s love for her and his loyalty in his treatment of her. If a married woman sees long hair in her dream, but it is white, this is evidence of her husband’s betrayal. And his lack of loyalty in his treatment and that he will soon marry a young woman with a project. Long hair in a black married woman’s dream symbolizes Her intelligence and distinctive thinking. And her ability to overcome difficulties and solve problems with wisdom. And the interpretation of the dream of long hair is sometimes a sign of this woman's failure in family relationships. And her husband's arrogance towards her, and his desire to stay away from her. And the dream of long hair in a married woman's dream, and it was more than one color other than black, is an indication of that. She has a sense of humor and a constant desire to change many aspects of her life. And it appears that she has an attractive spirit that constantly attracts her husband. But seeing this woman's long hair and cutting it is a sign of the many problems that fill her life. He cannot overcome them and these problems may end in separation from her husband.

title: Interpretation of the forest in a dream The meaning of the dark forest in a dream

preview.html: ForestInterpretation of a dream about the forest and animalsInterpretation of seeing walking in the forest in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a dark forestThe forest in an individual’s dreamI dreamed that I was in a forestThe green forest in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about running in the forestInterpretation of a dream about a forest animalThe dream in which the forest appears has a dark and surprising feeling sometimes prevails, and we do not forget, of course, that the forest has existed for ages. The ancient one was a refuge for man himself before it became the kingdom of predatory animals. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is going into the forest, then in reality he is doing something that requires courage, cunning and good management. The dense shadows of trees and the sounds of animals express the ambiguity of a vision of the future, as well as the secrets hidden by time and the fears of confronting cunning and cunning. As for the message that the dream of the forest sends to the dreamer, it is the necessity of showing courage with great care, because the forest hides among its trees the most wild creatures such as snakes and snakes, the fiercest animals such as wolves, foxes and hyenas, and the most cunning and treacherous such as monkeys and the forest in this context. It symbolizes a strange or unknown city. Sometimes the forest appears in a dream bare of trees exposed to the eye, which means that the road is safe, the paths are open, and the vision is clear. This is a problem, and if a predator appears to him, he can deal with it or make it disappear. As for the person who dreams that he is lost or lost in the forest , as he did not find a way out, this means that the dreamer is surrounded by negative thoughts or by people who harbor hostility and hatred towards him. It is disliked because feeling terror or fear in a dream is an expression of a positive psychological charge that enables the dreamer to deal with all his affairs with wisdom and insight. Seeing a dark forest in a dream: A dark forest in a dream symbolizes the present life full of sadness or psychological conflicts, and it is a sign of tension and distress. Walking or walking at night in a dark forest also depicts the dreamer’s desire to overcome his problems and anxiety by entering an unknown world and searching for a new adventure. It may be emotional at first, but the dark forest may symbolize loneliness or a feeling of psychological alienation. Interpretation of seeing a green forest in a dream: Walking or walking in a green forest indicates a fruitful and renewed life, as the dense trees and shadows symbolize protection and safety, and the animals in this forest symbolize the people who live with or accompany the dreamer, including friends such as rabbits, squirrels, hedgehogs, turtles, birds, and sparrows, and among them are enemies such as scorpions. And life, snakes, lions, hyenas, and among them are hypocrites like monkeys. The science of dream interpretation in Western societies considers the green forest in a dream a complete model of social life, because whoever lives in the middle of the green forest may have to face all kinds of people. Controlling the forest in a dream is equivalent to controlling life itself through force and authority. Interpretation of seeing forest animals in Dream: Dreaming of a lion in the forest symbolizes a person in control or someone with authority, such as a leader

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister bleeding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my sister bleeding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister bleeding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister bleeding in a dream could be evidence of the sister’s fatigue and need for prayer, and God knows all that is unseen. Where the sister can express her months of fatigue and the necessity of praying for recovery, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees her sister bleeding, she may This is evidence of the exhaustion that the dreamer or the sister is suffering from, and God knows best. Likewise, bleeding in a dream could mean that you will be relieved from stress, and God knows all that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister looking at me with hatred in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my sister looking at me with malice in a dream. Hatred and envy could be evidence that I am going through a difficult time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if a married woman sees hatred in a dream, this may lead to separation, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees envy in a dream, this may be evidence of the failure of some emotional relationships, And God knows best. If a married man sees hatred and envy, this may be a sign of some problems that he may go through, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who killed a snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who killed a snake in a dream can lead to the ability to overcome... Problems, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself killing a snake in a dream, this may mean that she is getting rid of problems and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees herself killing a snake in a dream, this may be evidence of overcoming problems and worries, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees the unseen. Her sister kills a snake in a dream, as this may indicate that the sister can overcome problems and worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister kissing me on the mouth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about kissing my sister on the mouth in a dream. Interpretation scholars said that seeing a kiss could indicate the need for love or tenderness, and God Highest and Most Knowing: If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream kissing her lover on the mouth, this may mean that she will receive a sum of money, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, kissing a girl on the mouth in a dream could indicate marriage, and God knows the unseen. If the girl sees someone she knows kissing her on the mouth. This may mean that she will receive a blessing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister giving me henna in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister giving me henna in a dream. Perhaps drawing henna will be good and happy, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees henna inscriptions in a dream, this means that she will get rid of problems and worries, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a henna inscription in a dream, this may indicate goodness and happiness for the girl, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees a henna inscription, this may indicate that she is approaching marriage, traveling, or fulfilling her desire, and God knows best. Interpretation of my sister’s dream of drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of my sister’s dream Drinking alcohol in a dream could be a sign of sin, and God has all knowledge. Likewise, if a married woman sees her sister drinking alcohol, this may lead to disturbance, and God knows all that is unseen.

title: I dreamed that I caught a young falcon from Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: I dreamed that I caught a baby hawk. Falcons are birds of prey and are a symbol of strength and authority. Watching it in a dream leads to many interpretations and meanings, and they vary depending on the person’s condition and the events within the dream. All the opinions of scholars on the interpretation of a dream about a hawk will be presented in detail in this article. I dreamed that I caught a small hawk. I dreamed that I caught a small hawk in a dream. It has many interpretations, namely: If one sees that he is holding a small hawk in his dream, this is a clear indication that he will reach a small hawk. He was trying to reach it, which will lead him to a feeling of joy and pleasure. Seeing catching a small falcon in a dream indicates little livelihood and little money, but it will be enough to buy the necessities of life. If the dreamer is pregnant and sees in her dream capturing a small falcon but it escapes, this is an indication On the presence of obstacles that lead to the failure of the birth process and continued suffering after it. I dreamed that I found a small falcon in a married woman’s dream, which symbolizes that God will soon grant her good offspring. If one sees in his dream that he is hunting a small falcon, then there is a clear indication of healthy upbringing and fruitful upbringing. If the dreamer is single and sees in her dream that she is holding a small falcon, then she will be engaged to a good young man. I dreamed that I caught a small falcon from Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many interpretations related to seeing a small falcon in the dreamer’s dream, which are: If a person is corrupt and unjust and sees a falcon in his dream This is clear evidence of his high position, gaining influence and power and exploiting it to harm and humiliate the weak. If the ruler is fair and just and sees a falcon in his dream, his status in society will rise and everyone will turn to him to seek advice and get his opinion on their affairs. If the dreamer sees that he caught the falcon but it flew away From his hands and only his legs remain, this dream is not good and indicates a material loss that he will suffer. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing a falcon in a person’s dream indicates overcoming and undermining opponents. I dreamed that I caught a small falcon for Nabulsi. The great scholar Nabulsi will explain many signs that we saw A baby falcon in a dream, the most important of which are: If a person sees in his dream that he is carrying a baby falcon, this is evidence that he is surrounded by multi-faceted people whose hearts are full of malice and hatred towards him and who wish for the blessing to be separated from his hands. But God saves him from them. Al-Nabulsi also believes that seeing a small falcon in a dream symbolizes many blessings and gifts and the restoration of the dreamer’s financial condition at the same time. If the dreamer sees a small falcon in his dream, this is a sign that he will have the opportunity to travel and make great profits from it. Also Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of a small falcon as good news for the fortuneteller, indicating the arrival of good news, glad tidings, and the achievement of goals. I dreamed that I caught a small falcon by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen, one of the scholars of interpretation, explained more than one meaning of the dream of catching a small falcon in a person’s dream, the most important of which is: If one sees it in his dream That he caught a small hawk, but it managed to escape from his hands, then this is a sign of p

title: Interpretation of seeing a large crowd of people

preview.html: A large crowd of celebrities. When we dream of a large crowd of people whom the dreamer knows in the dream, this indicates cheerful news. As for the one who sees himself walking around and walking in a house full of people and finds that he knows them and that they are in good condition, this is a sign of widespread livelihood for the viewer. A dream about a group of people going to the mosque in the case of the dream Whoever sees in a dream a gathering of people going to the mosque, this indicates that the affairs of the fortuneteller will be facilitated and the doors of livelihood will be opened before him. Dreaming of a group of people walking on the street regularly in a dream indicates happy news and events. Seeing a group of strangers about a young man. A young man who dreams of a large crowd of people that he does not know in the dream. The dream heralds goodness and blessings in his livelihood. A large crowd of people is known to the dreamer in the dream, and they were smiling and laughing, a sign of his marriage very soon. A young man dreams of a group of people crying in his sleep, indicating bad events and misfortunes. As for whoever sees a lot of people walking around his house, it is evidence of an abundance of sustenance. He wishes Good luck to the young man. Interpretation of a large number of married people. A large crowd in a dream for a married woman shows her husband’s sincere love for her. But if she sees in her dream a crowd of people crying loudly, this is evidence of the huge diet of her and her husband. A married woman who has children when she dreams of a large crowd is not... Known to her in a dream is a sign of anxiety. The strong feelings she always feels towards her children and her fear of hurting or harming them, so she has to reduce this feeling so that she can live stably. A large crowd of people smiling and talking appears. She enjoys watching. Whoever sees that there is a large crowd on the way to When she enters her home and receives them politely, the vision indicates her morals, her love for people, and their love for her. Whoever sees a large crowd inside her home congratulating her means that they hear the news of the pregnancy. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing black clothes in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing black clothes in a dream is a vision that has many interpretations, which we will try to learn about during this article by Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin, whether it is a man, woman, or single girl, especially since seeing black clothes in a dream varies according to the details of the dream and the person who dreams, such as seeing a woman chasing me with clothes. Black or a strange woman in a dream wearing black clothes, but it is important before starting to list the interpretations of black clothes in a dream, to emphasize that there is no interpretation that we will give in it. Any vision in any other vision should be rejected and one of the dream interpreters with legal knowledge should be examined for anyone who wishes to interpret a vision. You may also be interested in: Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of seeing black clothes in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing black clothes in a dreamIbn Sirin says that wearing black clothes In a dream it can be an undesirable sign that there are some problems that the dreamer will face. Also, if the dreamer really prefers the color black and dreams of wearing black, it may be an indication that he will be able to achieve his goals in the coming period. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in Dreaming about seeing black clothes in Nabulsi’s dream. If the dream is that a person is wearing black clothes, then Nabulsi believes that this could be an indication of the sins and sins committed by that person. Also, black clothes in a dream may be a sign that the dreamer will go through a major disaster that he needs to pay attention to. In addition, Al-Nabulsi believes that wearing black clothes in a dream can be a warning to the dreamer to avoid sins. Seeing black clothes in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream that she is wearing a long black dress, this may indicate that there are some positive changes that will occur. This girl is on vacation. Also, wearing black clothes in a married woman’s dream can indicate that she is a self-confident girl. In addition, a black dress or a black dress in a married woman’s dream could be an indication of the stress and sadness that this girl is suffering from. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Seeing a black dress in a single woman’s dream An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is wearing black clothes, this indicates that she will succeed in the coming period - God willing. Also, the girl who wears black clothes in a dream indicates that This girl has a lot of self-confidence. Seeing black clothes in a dream for a man. A man who sees black clothes in a dream and in reality prefers black, this is one of the signs that this person deserves praise and admiration. Just like a young man who sees in a dream that there is a man wearing black clothes and he dies. , this may indicate that the deceased committed a lot of sins. You may also be interested in: Washing the deadSeeing a woman dressed in black chasing me in a dreamIf you dream of a woman dressed in black in a dream chasing the dreamer

title: Interpretation of dreams for a married or married woman getting married again

preview.html: Marrying again in a dream is an interpretation of livelihood, work, and projects, and marriage in visions and dreams is profit and travel. Interpretation of a man’s marriage in a dream to a woman other than his wife or an unknown woman. If a married man sees in his dream that he is marrying a woman other than his wife, then he will gain in this world a lot of money. Money, power, or a wonderful position. If he marries his mother in a dream, his life will improve. If he sees that he is marrying his sister in his language, this is good news at work. As for his dream that he marries his stepmother other than his mother, this is a pursuit of dishonest gain. A man’s marriage to his aunt in a dream has changed the circumstances For the better. As for a man, if he sees in a dream that he is marrying his wife, this is good for his family and perhaps the children will be able to study. Interpretation of a woman’s marriage in a dream to a man other than her husband: A married woman’s marriage in a dream means striving to change things for the better. Her wedding in a dream may indicate her strong desire to build a connected family relationship. A married woman’s marriage to her father in a dream is a bond of kinship and communication. A married woman’s marriage to her brother in a dream shows her happiness with her husband. A married woman’s marriage to her uncle in a dream indicates abundance of livelihood and money. The marriage of a married woman to her uncle in a dream indicates her readiness to travel or move from one place to another. The marriage of a married woman to her cousin or uncle indicates a great surprise and is often enjoyable. A woman’s marriage in a dream by her husband’s father is her husband’s love for her. Popularity A woman married to a strange man she does not know is a long, long journey.

title: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream is one of the dreams that has different interpretations according to seeing fish, such as seeing raw fish in a dream, and the interpretation of the vision varies according to opinion, whether it is a man, an unmarried girl, or a woman. It is one of the processes that depends on rules and regulations that do not depend only on the dream scene, but also on some things related to the ureter, which the interpreter must know so that he can help the world in the accurate interpretation of the dream. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of a vision Fish in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing fish in a dream The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a fish in a dream is among us, its most important connotations are the extensive means of livelihood in addition to the abundant money that the opinion can gain. In addition, raw fish in a dream can be a sign On enemies and competition. As for fishing in a dream, this is the human type based on the opinion of his ability to succeed in life. Likewise, it is said that a person sees in a dream that he caught a fish and found pearls in his mouth, then this may be from the human type that he will give birth to a boy from him, and God knows best. In addition to dreaming of a fish tank, this may be a sign of good luck for the dreamer, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing fish in a dream Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi says that fish in a dream is a praiseworthy sign that generally indicates good luck that one enjoys The dreamer. Al-Nabulsi also says that a black fish in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will get married soon - God willing. In addition to the dreamer seeing a dead fish in the sea in a dream, this may indicate that the world may be exposed to evil, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi also says that Seeing grilled fish in a dream may be a sign that the dreamer will be able - God willing - to defeat enemies. In addition to buying fish in a dream, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Seeing fish in a dream for a woman Single: An unmarried girl who sees a fish in a dream, this may be an indication that there is good news that the girl will hear in the coming period, and God knows best. Also, if an unmarried girl sees a fish in a dream, this may be an indication that she will be able to achieve her dreams in the coming period. Next.In addition, cooked fish in a dream for one girl indicates good luck – God willing.You may also be interested in: Washing the deadSeeing fish in a dream for a married womanA married woman who sees a fish in a dream is one of the signs of goodness that this woman will gain. Completely Like a married woman who sees her wife serving a fish in a dream, this may be due to the human condition in which she will become pregnant - God willing. In addition to a married woman who sees herself in a dream eating fish, this indicates the livelihood that she will obtain without effort. Seeing a fish In a dream for a pregnant woman, a pregnant woman
